PreceptDef.label: loved
PreceptDef.description: Onesies are the best! They are comfy, cute, and even make diapers last longer!

PreceptDef.label: neutral
PreceptDef.description: Onesies are childish, but they are pretty comfortable. If nothing better is in reach, they are alright.

PreceptDef.label: hated
PreceptDef.description: Why should I ever wear baby clothes. I am an adult!
